mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.status AS "status", a.count AS "count", a.accout_group AS "accoutGroup", a.save_id AS "saveId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accout( id, user_id, status, count, accout_group, save_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{status}, #{count}, #{accoutGroup}, #{saveId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE accout SET user_id = #{user.id}, status = #{status}, count = #{count}, accout_group = #{accoutGroup}, save_id = #{saveId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
